planned.name: Free Games Cheker
planned.description:
Search game stores such as GOG, Epic Games and Steam for paid games that have gone free.

The bot should then send an embed with info of the game fetched from the store page  as well as a button link to the store to claim

```
planned.name: Library backup
planned.description:
---

### **Overview & Purpose**

The `/library_backup` command acts as your **personal archive generator**, letting you export your tracked series collection into different formats for safekeeping, analysis, or sharing. It isn’t just about having files — it’s about **owning your data**.

---

### **Functional Description**

#### **Export Types**

* **JSON** → Developer-friendly, structured, and lightweight.
* **CSV** → Spreadsheet-ready, great for statistics and progress charts.
* **XML** → Structured for compatibility with third-party apps.
* **YAML (Optional)** → Minimal and human-readable.
* **Plain Text (Optional)** → Nostalgic diary-style list.

#### **Scope of Export**

* **Full Library** → Every tracked entry.
* **Status Filter** → Completed, Watching/Reading, Dropped, Paused, Planned.
* **Type Filter** → Anime only, Manga only, Light Novels only.
* **Tag Filter** → Export works tagged with user-defined labels (favorites, backlog, etc.).

#### **Metadata Included**

* Title
* Status
* Progress (episodes/chapters)
* Ratings
* Notes / Tags
* Start & finish dates
* Reread/rewatch counts
* Last updated

---

### **Customization**

* **Format selection** → JSON, CSV, XML, TXT.
* **Scope selection** → All series, completed only, etc.
* **Extended metadata** → Toggle for including advanced fields.
* **Delivery method** → DM (private) or channel (public share).

---

# **Visualizations & Aesthetics**

---

### **1. Command Trigger**

When you type `/library_backup`, an **embed panel** appears guiding you:

```
📚✨ Library Backup Exporter
─────────────────────────────
Preserve your entire tracked library in the format of your choice.  
Build spreadsheets, migrate data, or safeguard memories —  
your collection is always yours.

🌐 Formats: JSON | CSV | XML | TXT  
🗂 Scope: All | Completed | Watching | Dropped | Tags  
🔐 Delivery: Private DM | Channel Drop  

─────────────────────────────
Every story you’ve tracked, now archived in your hands.
```

---

### **2. Embed Mockup (Discord style)**

**Embed Example**:

* **Title**: 📚✨ *Library Backup Exporter*
* **Description**: *“Preserve your entire tracked library in the format of your choice. Whether you’re building spreadsheets, migrating your data, or safeguarding memories — your collection remains yours.”*
* **Fields**:

  * 🌐 **Available Formats** → JSON | CSV | XML | TXT
  * 🗂 **Export Scope** → All | Completed | Watching | Dropped | Tags
  * 🔐 **Delivery Method** → Direct Message (Private) or Channel Drop
* **Footer**: *Every story you’ve tracked, now archived in your hands.*

**Embed Colors**:

* Border Gradient → Deep Navy → Gold
* Background Highlight → Slight parchment/archival tone

---

### **3. Button & Dropdown UI**

Visual controls:

* 📄 Dropdown: **Choose Export Format**

  * JSON
  * CSV
  * XML
  * TXT
* 🎯 Dropdown: **Choose Scope**

  * Full Library
  * Completed
  * Watching/Reading
  * Dropped
  * Paused
* ✅ Button: **Generate Backup**

---

### **4. File Delivery Visualization**

When export is done:

```
✅ Backup Generated Successfully!
─────────────────────────────
Your library has been exported.  
File: library_backup.json  
Format: JSON  
Scope: Full Library  

Timestamp: 2025-09-29 • Safe & Sound
─────────────────────────────
```

---

### **5. Extra Visual Flair**

**Progress Bar for Exporting**:

```
Generating CSV Backup...
▓▓▓▓▓▓▓░░░░░░░░ 55% Complete
```

**Status Emojis in Exports**:

* 📖 Reading
* 🎬 Watching
* 🏁 Completed
* ❌ Dropped
* ⏸ Paused

**ASCII Signature for TXT exports**:

```
─────────────────────────────
Exported via /library_backup
Stay organized. Stay inspired.
─────────────────────────────
